entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
